pullrequest.title: VariableGearboxPlugin: use splines to support arbitrary smooth input-output gearbox profiles

content.html:
ok, I'm waiting for it to compile and then I will test the following:

diff -r 4c13949814db plugins/VariableGearboxPlugin.cc
--- a/plugins/VariableGearboxPlugin.cc  Thu Mar 28 16:14:22 2019 -0700
+++ b/plugins/VariableGearboxPlugin.cc  Thu Mar 28 16:21:21 2019 -0700
@@ -19,6 +19,7 @@
 #include <functional>
 #include <gazebo/common/Assert.hh>
 #include <gazebo/common/Events.hh>
+#include <gazebo/common/Exception.hh>
 #include <gazebo/physics/Joint.hh>
 #include <gazebo/physics/Link.hh>
 #include "VariableGearboxPlugin.hh"
@@ -264,9 +265,7 @@
   }
   else
   {
-    gzerr << "No x_y_dydx elements detected"
-          << std::endl;
-    return;
+    gzthrow("No x_y_dydx elements detected");
   }

   this->dataPtr->updateConnection = event::Events::ConnectWorldUpdateBegin(
